title: Mastery 7 tokens bugged?
body: Last week i got a mastery 7 token on volibear, since then i have gotten 4 to 5 more S or S+ on volibear in ranked matches and i havent gotten any more tokens, i have a total of 2 tokens. I get other mastery tokens on different champs but for voli i dont get any, i am aware after you get like a chat restriction or any sort of punishment from riot, you dont acquire them, and i havent gotten any sort of punishment, but i have been getting keys/chest/and other champ mastery tokens just not on voli, any ideas??

replies.body: It's strange you haven't received tokens yet, so I took a look into this for you.  While you are indeed playing ranked, it's for Twisted Treeline.  Per the [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide, currently tokens are awarded through Summoner's Rift for now.  Let me know if that clears things up!
